GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles
queries: order (default: desc, valid options: asc, desc)

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Retrieves a single article by its ID.

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a comment by its ID. If the comment exists, it is removed and the response status is 204 (No Content). If the comment does not exist, responds with a 404 error.

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: Retrieves a single user by their username.
